body.name: Sceptre IPS 24-Inch Business Computer Monitor 1080p 75Hz with HDMI VGA Build-in Speakers, Machine Black (E248W-FPT)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 5 mins
features: Wide Viewing Angles: Wide viewing angles keep all the action sharply in sight from almost any viewing position while gaming on large monitors or dual-display setup.

Fast Response Time: Playing fast action games and watching action adventure movies always require fast and accurate pixel response from an LED. With quick response times, ghosting and blurring are reduced so the user can enjoy the display with clarity and precision.

Multiple Ports: Two HDMI ports and one VGA port provide up to 75HZ refresh rate, refining picture clarity in all action-packed gaming sequences and graphic design projects. Audio In and a Headphone Jack provide diverse audio options.
Edgeless Design: Edgeless Design completely immerses you in all the captivating action and wondrous scenery that 1080P resolution and 75Hz refresh rate have to offer.

VESA Wall Mountable: The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor, eliminate cable clutter, and save valuable space for your gaming and work station.
99% sRGB: With 99% sRGB, this monitor offers a wider color gamut than most conventional monitors, giving deeper colors and defining features.
Blue Light Shift: Blue Light Shift reduces blue light, allowing you to comfortably work, watch, or play applications without straining your eyes.
FPS-RTS Game Modes: FPS and RTS are Sceptre's custom set display settings built for an enhanced gaming experience. FPS (First Person Shooter), RTS (Real-Time Strategy).
body.description: 24" HDMI Monitor 1920 x 1080 FHD Resolution 75Hz Refresh Rate IPS Panel 300 nits Brightness Wide Viewing Angles.Aspect Ratio: 16:9

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adaptive Sync Adaptive Sync is a technology that closes the gap between the graphics card's and the monitor's refresh rates, eliminating image tearing and stuttering in the process. IPS Panel The IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel cannot be beat when it comes to consistently delivering top color performance and sharp visibility from multiple viewing angles. Edgeless Design Edgeless Design completely immerses you in all the captivating action and wondrous scenery that 1080P resolution and 75Hz refresh rate have to offer.

99% sRGB Color Gamut With 99% sRGB, our display reveals an astonishing brightness and variance in red, green, and blue color across a wide gamut, providing a more defined and naturalistic display of color in every image. Multiple Ports Two HDMI ports and one VGA port provide up to 75HZ refresh rate, refining picture clarity in all action-packed gaming sequences and graphic design projects. Audio In and a Headphone Jack provide diverse audio options. For the Brightness you need Remarkably vivid colors illuminate the screen like never before.

Fast Response Time Playing fast action games and watching action adventure movies always require fast and accurate pixel response from an LED. With quick response times, ghosting and blurring are reduced so the user can enjoy the display with clarity and precision. Blue Light Shift Reduce your monitors blue light to protect you from eye fatigue, irritation and strains. This enables you to work on your documents, watch movies, or play games more comfortably for extended periods. Built-in Speakers With built-in speakers, the monitor delivers office level audio for conference calls and internet workshops. Similarly, enjoy engaging audio while listening to your favorite tunes.

Anti-Flicker Provides a crisper picture by preventing the backlight from flickering periodically. 75Hz Refresh Rate With 75Hz refresh rate, images change faster and smoother than the standard, reducing screen tearing VESA Wall Mountable The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor, eliminate cable clutter, and save valuable space for your gaming and work station.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice monitor
reviews.reviewText: My kids both play video games, and want the super fast OLED monitor, with all the bells and whistles. I don't even know what the bells and whistles are these days. I needed a decent monitor for a computer I recently got. I am not going to be playing much more than solitaire, it is mostly for work. So when I saw this one, I thought it was perfect. It has exactly what I need, a pretty big, crisp, clear monitor. Super easy to hook up, power plug and HDMI plug. Also has ports for a VGA line, speakers or headphones. It does have speakers, they are small, not wonderful sound, but OK. Again, for me, they are great.Best thing was that I plugged my laptop into the monitor to try it out, and boom, came right up, everything just the way it was supposed to be. If you are really into gaming, or want great sound quality, or some super fast refresh rate, you will find a monitor that meet those needs. If you are like me, want a decent monitor, but will not be doing much, if any, gaming and just looking for a decent, reasonably priced monitor for work or home, this will work great for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good screen quality. Sound is lacking.
reviews.reviewText: The screen quality is great. Maximum brightness is great for playing darker games. The size is perfect for personal work and moderate gaming.Tried using this with a FireStick. The FireStick cannot control the volume of the monitor (neither can my computer). Volume should be adjusted using the buttons in the back. Volume and sound quality is okay for me. Not the best, but usable. Screen does shake a bit if you touch or try to use the buttons in the back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sharp - Very Clear images!
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded to this monitor from an Acer 21.5 inch. It was also an HD monitor, but this Sceptre IPS monitor has superior imaging! I am currently connected to my Windows 7-64 computer by VGA connector. Even in VGA, the images are sharp, crisp and clear! I have ordered a graphics card so that I can try this out in an HDMI connection. Perhaps I can edit this review to add my thoughts after this change. I am not a gamer so I have nothing viable to mention on this monitor as a gaming monitor. For graphics, this monitor is the best monitor I have ever used since 1998! This is the first monitor that I find I can use at 1920 x 1080 comfortably. In the past I could only comfortably read a1600x900 screen! This one is so clear! It is definately Awesome (Brilliant)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Modern look, decent quality
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Sexy designCheapDual mount would look goodFree screw driverCons:Mediocre displaySpringy standThese cons aren’t real problems in my opinion, just minor annoyances.Explanations:Display-Somewhat of a washed out display. I triple checked to make sure there was no protective film on the screen if that gives you an idea. After messing with the color setting I was able to mitigate the issue, to an extent.Springy stand- this would not be a problem except when typing during video meetings, I notice my video bouncing around.Best feature: The screw driver.Guys, this is a quality screw driver! I’ve been on the hunt for a small, magnetic Phillips head for a few months now and ended up buying this screw driver set with a complicated magnet attachment... then came this screw driver. It’s just a perfect all around screw driver for little pc projects and is really comfortable as well.Overall:I’m not disappointed. Buying a monitor at this price range, you can’t expect exceptional display quality and it’s still 1080p. The bezels are small and the monitor is thin and light, giving it a newer look to your setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always liked Sceptre products. They are a very good quality and are remarkably affordable. The picture refresh rate is incredible. Playing games on this will work and will work fine however for high refresh games such as COD and Starfield the latency is a bit too much. However for a third, fourth or second monitor for work you really cannot find a better product at this price point. I have several Sceptre monitors and every one of them have outlasted the other higher priced manufacturers. I will always support Sceptre. and will forever recommend any of there products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The is item works great for gaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is no technical review The monitor replaces one that died—of old age, I guess. It produces a hi-def image with very saturated colors. My accounting software’s text and numerals appear as sharp as can be. There are provisions to adjust image colors, etc, but I found the monitor worked very well for my purposes right out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very light and simple monitor. Good for money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen monitor con excelente calidad en brillo, color y definición.
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó la calidad en cuanto a brillo, color y definición. Las conexiones traseras son las más completas con dos salidas HDMI y salida y entrada de audio. Tiene bocinas que no son la gran cosa pero para salir del paso en navegación, chatear, videoconferencia si sirven. El unico punto que les falla es en los negros de la pantalla, que no es tan uniforme. No es para jugar realmente aunque tiene tasa de refresco de 75 Hz que ayuda algo, pero por el precio no le puedes exigir lo mismo que a uno que cuesta el doble o más. Yo tengo un par de monitores gamer LG de 24" con excelente calidad ( costaron cada uno mas del doble que este Sceptre) y no desmerece gran cosa respecto a ellos.Algo que no se comenta en la descripción es que el monitor tiene capacidad de montaje VESA e incluye un desarmador y unos separadores atornillables (muy útiles) para colocar una base de pared o algun accesorio como una micro PC o un TV box.

New to PC building, I bought this for my budget gaming rig. The image is sharp, I love the edgeless design, and it's the perfect size for my desk. If you're a serious gamer, I'd look for a 1ms monitor, but for the average person this one is great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad a un precio casi insuperable
reviews.reviewText: El monitor es muy delgado, muy práctico, tiene buen brillo y filtra la luz azul del monitor que te cansa la vista. Casi no tiene bordes lo cual lo hace muy vistoso. No es para gamers serios pero si para cualquier usuario normal o profesional que no busque un frame rate muy alto para juegos. Vale la pena, lo recomiendo.
